title: Health Data Visualization Tools – Graphical Trends for Vital Signs
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to visualize patient health metrics over time so that I can identify trends and anticipate health deterioration more effectively.

title: Personalized Care Plan Management – Goal Tracking for Patient Health Improvements
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to track patient health progression over time using personalized care plans, so that I can identify early warning signs and provide timely interventions based on historical health data.

title: Anomaly Detection and Alerts for Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts for any anomalies in my patients' health metrics so that I can identify early signs of deterioration and intervene promptly.

title: Automated Medication Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want automated reminders for patients' medication schedules so that I can efficiently monitor their adherence and prevent critical health events.

title: Remote Patient Check-in Interface - Progress Tracking for Ongoing Health Concerns
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to track patient health progression over time through an intuitive interface so that I can identify early warning signs and improve care strategies effectively.

title: Emergency Response Coordination – Caregiver Alerting for Emergency Situations
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive immediate alerts in case of emergency situations so that I can respond promptly to my patients' needs and ensure their safety.

title: Holistic Health Tracking – Mental Health Check-Ins and Resources
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to utilize mental health check-ins and resources through ALFRED so that I can better understand my patients' emotional states and provide tailored support during remote care.
